Diagnostic Knowledge and Skills Framework

Injector Competency (MRXperion)

Responsible StaffCompleted
Correctly attach syringe/s without contamination of sterile parts
Loading of contrast into syringe without contamination of sterile parts
Able to load with contrast & saline safely
Able to observe and remove air bubbles form the syringes and tubing
Ensures that all air is expelled from the syringe and tubing whilst the syringe is upright
Tilts the pump nose down, and visually assess the syringe and tubing for any air bubbles, expelling them if necessary. Express contrast from the sterile end of the connecting tube and connect to the cannula
Able to arm & start the injector correctly
Check all contrast details prior to loading including expiry date
Aware of the amount of contrast and flow rates required for each examination
Understanding of all set parameters on the monitor
Able to perform a test injection to check positioning (advance small dosage)
Able to stop the injector in an emergency
Explain procedure to patient and ensure they understand how to alert staff if needed
Aware of contrast media reactions and safety precautions
Knowledge of Fault Reporting Procedures
